snippet: Each side has accused the other of assaults before a cease-fire brokered by Kofi Annan, the special envoy appointed by the United Nations and the Arab League.
abstract: Violence rocks a wide portion of Syria with activists saying that about 100 people had been killed just days before a cease-fire that calls on the government to withdraw its heavy weaponry from cities and towns is to take effect; Syrian Army had been shelling villages for about 72 hours without stopping.
lead_paragraph: Each side has accused the other of assaults before a cease-fire brokered by Kofi Annan, the special envoy appointed by the United Nations and the Arab League.

headline.seo: Violence Intensifies in Syria Before Planned Truce
headline.main: Violence Intensifies in Syria as a Planned Truce Nears
headline.print_headline: Violence Intensifies in Syria As a Planned Truce Nears
